traits.name: Keen Senses
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

actions.name: Concentrate
entries: Nil can concentrate on a spell for its Summoner
